sentences.sContent: Crossing the channel to nineteenth-century Paris, Shteir tracks the rise of the department store and the pathologizing of shoplifting as kleptomania.
sentences.sContent_eng: Crossing the channel to nineteenth-century Paris, Shteir tracks the rise of the department store and the pathologizing of shoplifting as kleptomania.
sentences.sCn: 穿越时光隧道走入十九世纪的巴黎，胥堤尔回顾了百货商店的兴起与盗窃癖的出现。

trans.tranOther: a mental illness in which you have a desire to steal things
